title: Microbiology for Kids: OLogy | AMNH
description: Play games, watch videos, and read about the microscopic organisms that live in and on you.
cleaned_text: Microbiology What is Microbiology? Microbiology is the study of bacteria, viruses, and other microbes that are invisible to the eye. These tiny creatures are everywhere, even on you and in you! Don't worry, most microbes are harmless to humans.
